Author: PoorLama
Text: I'm sorry that you are suffering from forces out of your control. You are strong though, you'd have to be to survive as long as you have with this pain.    It helps to realize that you are using food as a means to punish yourself. There is something in our brains that tells us we deserve to suffer but this is not true.    I have posted here about my suicidal tendencies, so I understand how difficult it is, but I would encourage you to speak with someone about what you are feeling. Even just to vent.
